content: in 3ch space 3ch skip 2 treble_crochet treble_crochet in each of next 11 treble_crochet * repeat from * to * 4 more times 3ch skip 2 treble_crochet double_crochet in 3ch space 3ch skip 2 treble_crochet treble_crochet in remaining 13 treble_crochet 8 2 chain treble_crochet in each of next 10 treble_crochet * 3ch skip 2 treble_crochet double_crochet in 3ch space 3ch double_crochet in next 3ch space 3ch skip 2 treble_crochet 1 treble_crochet in each of next 7 treble_crochet * repeat from * to * 4 more times 3 chain skip 2 treble_crochet double_crochet in 3ch space 3ch double_crochet in next 3ch space 3ch skip 2 treble_crochet treble_crochet in each of 11 remaining treble_crochet 9 2ch treble_crochet in each of next 10 treble_crochet * 2tr in 3ch space 3ch double_crochet in next 3ch space 3ch 2tr in next 3ch space treble_crochet in each of next 7 treble_crochet * repeat from * to * 4 more times 2tr in 3ch space 3ch double_crochet in next 3ch space 3ch double_crochet in next 3ch space 3ch 2tr in next 3ch space treble_crochet in each of 11 remaining treble_crochet 10 2ch treble_crochet in each of next 12 treble_crochet * 2tr in 3ch space 2ch 2tr in next 3ch space treble_crochet in each of next 11 treble_crochet * repeat from * to * 4 more times 2 treble_crochet in next 3ch space 2ch 2tr in next 3ch space treble_crochet in each of 13 remaining treble_crochet row 11 completes the second line of flowers and begins the next 11 2ch treble_crochet in each of next 6 treble_crochet * 3ch skip a treble_crochet treble_crochet in each of next 7 treble_crochet 1 treble_crochet in 2ch space 1 treble_crochet in each of next 7 treble_crochet * repeat from * to * 5 more times 3ch skip 1 treble_crochet treble_crochet into each of 7 remaining treble_crochet repeat row 1-6 and 7-11 7 more times and then 1-6 once more border join yarn at top left corner do not turn you will be working down this long side work 3dc in corner chain 1 work a double_crochet ch1 into the side of each treble_crochet down to the next corner work 3 double_crochet in the corner and a double_crochet into the underside of each treble_crochet along the bottom 3dc in next corner ch1 work a double_crochet ch1 into the side of each treble_crochet along up to the top corner 3dc into the corner work a double_crochet into the top of each treble_crochet across the top of the blanket slip st to first double_crochet to complete
